participant_1.name: Maya
participant_1.personality: Creative and enthusiastic, with a passion for anime and gaming.
participant_1.background: I love sushi because it reminds me of the ocean, where my beta fish lives. I'm too short to reach the top shelf. My favorite drink is iced coffee. I recently got to dress up and explore my nerdy side at Comic Con. Someday I would like a truck.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and supportive, with a dedication to family and a love for gaming and creativity.
participant_2.background: I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths. My first activity is checking my grades. I like to spend rainy days in my studio, practicing my dance moves. I would brag about being a good father and making my family happy. I am a graduate student studying law.

content.text: I recently went to Comic Con and dressed up as a character from my favorite anime. It was a lot of fun, and I got to meet a lot of people who are also interested in anime.
That sounds really fun! I've always wanted to go to Comic Con, but I've never been able to make it.
You should definitely go sometime! It's a great experience.
I will! Maybe next year.
Awesome!
So, what's your favorite anime?
My favorite anime is Fullmetal Alchemist: Brotherhood. It's a really good story, and the characters are all really well-developed.
I've heard good things about that one. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's one of my favorites.
So, what are you up to today?
Not much, just working on some homework. I have a big test tomorrow, so I'm trying to get a head start.
Good luck on your test!
Thanks!
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, play video games, and watch anime.
Me too! I love to read and play video games. I don't watch much anime, but I do like it.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play all kinds of video games, but my favorite genre is probably RPGs.
I love RPGs too! What's your favorite RPG?
My favorite RPG is probably The Witcher 3. It's such a great game.
I've heard good things about that game. I'll have to check it out.
You definitely should! It's one of the best RPGs ever made.
Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem
